project_descr: Support Local development in regions with special status: ATU Gagauzia and Taraclia district trhrough comnfidence building measures.

outputs.output_descr: Support to agriculture and rural development through promotion of confidence building measures

Support Local Development in Taraclia through rehabilitation of the physical infrastructure to provide access to potable water to local population and better conditions to students of Grigore Tsamblak University
